#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool comp(int a,int b)
{
    return (a>b);
}
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        return gcd(b,a%b);
}
char s[1000001];
int a[1000002],b[1000002];
int main(void) {
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",s);
        int i,n=strlen(s);
        long long int ans=0;
        a[n]=0;
        b[n]=0;
        for(i=n-1;i>0;--i)
        {
            a[i]=a[i+1];
            b[i]=b[i+1];
            if(s[i]=='L')
                a[i]++;
            else
                b[i]+=a[i];
        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;++i)
        {
            if(s[i]=='L')
                ans+=b[i+1];
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
